Did you think you could hurt me?$1#$b# You, a simple farmer? $1"/move farmer 0 5 0 false/pause 500/speed Apprentice 5/move Apprentice -25 0 3 true/speak Butler "Now, I thank you for your help, but you are no longer needed here."/pause 500/speak Apprentice "@, what's going on?$3"/pause 500/speak Butler "Oh yes, you. I had completely forgotten about you.$3#$b#Well, if you also wish to perish, I can do that as well."/pause 500/screenFlash 1/startJittering/pause 1000/shake Apprentice 1000/stopJittering/speak Butler "Well, it's been a pleasure, @, Purple-haired individual. #$b# Let the master know I said hello."/pause 1000/playSound debuffSpell/temporarySprite 54 27 13 8 20 false 5/pause 500/speak Butler "Ack! $3#$b#What was that?"/pause 500/speak Apprentice "Did you forget that I'm a wiizard's apprentice?$3#$b#You aren't the only one here capable of magic, y'know."/pause 500/speak Butler "Why you little...$3"/pause 200/speak Apprentice "Now's your chance @! Hit him again!"/pause 300/beginSimultaneousCommand/screenFlash 0.5/playSound thunder/speak Butler "Enough!$3"/endSimultaneousCommand/speak Butler "I have had enough of you, child. I do not care what you think you can do to me. $3#$b# I will silence you for good!$3"/pause 500/beginSimultaneousCommand/playSound coldSpell/temporarySprite 57 32 32 128 20 false 5/temporarySprite 57 33 32 128 20 false 5/pause 1280/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/warp Apprentice 0 0/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 0 false/animate farmer true false 50 36 37 38 39 40 41/screenFlash 0.2/pause 500/speak Butler "...Wha...$3#$b#What did you do?$3"/pause 500 /move farmer 0 5 0 false/pause 500/shake Butler 20000/pause 500/beginSimultaneousCommand/temporarySprite 54 28 31 64 20 false 5/temporarySprite 54 27 31 64 20 false 5/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/speak Butler "No. NO!$3"/pause 500/playSound explosion/temporarySprite 54 27 5 8 20 false 5/warp Butler 0 1/pause 1000/speak Butler "You piece of...TRASH!$3#$b#I was going to be all powerful!$3#$b#And I would've gotten away with it too if it wasn't for you meddling farmer and wizard!"/pause 1000/end

Entries.2051904/p Butler: nightTime/78 65/farmer 78 58 0 Butler 78 45 0/skippable/move farmer 0 13 2 false/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/animate farmer true false 50 24 25 26 27 28 29/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/move Butler 0 20 2 false/speak Butler "Ah, there it is.#$b#That totem is the reason that those monsters invade this place.#$b#Please, take this sword, and destroy it!$3"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Butler 0 5 2 false/pause 500/itemAboveHead 2051901/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize 2051901/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2 false/pause 1000/animate farmer true false 50 24 25 26 27 28 29/pause 500/screenFlash 0.5/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/animate farmer true false 50 24 25 26 27 28 29/pause 500/screenFlash 1/changeLocation Custom_Mansion_Basement_Chase/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/viewport move 0 3 5000/speak Butler "Ah, that's better.#$b#That totem was put there a long time ago, by the master, right before he passed away.#$b#With it in place, he could prevent me from growing too powerful.$3"/pause 1000 /speak Butler "It irritated me greatly when he first put it in place, so I made him pay.#$b#And now, you've gone and destroyed it for me."/pause 1000/speak Butler "Heh...heh...#$b#HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA $1"/screenFlash 1/warp Butler 0 0/pause 1000/end
